questions.question: For a web host, which proposal is not good practice?

answers.title: Provide environmental or at least usage indicators
Publish your carbon neutrality declaration
Be transparent about the management of your equipment

questions.answerInformation: Being carbon neutral has no physical reality on the scale of an organisation. It's very often used by digital players as a sales argument that clashes with reality: these players are increasingly increasing their impact by expanding their activities and setting up more and more data centres around the world. In short, it's greenwashing. Carbon offsetting should only be used to mitigate residual emissions. What's more, we're talking about contribution, not compensation.

questions.answerInformation: One of the criteria of the french ecodesign framework "RGESN" is to publish an ecodesign declaration explaining the efforts made. Having an ecodesign approach, advertising it but not wanting to share the details of the approach is akin to greenwashing.
